roleset.name: stop

example.name: transitive, NP theme
example.text: The ban won't cease privately-funded tissue-transplant research.

example.name: transitive, S theme
example.text: Lorillard Inc ceased using crocidolite in its Micronite cigarette filters in 1956.
example.arg: [Lorillard Inc][using crocidolite in its Micronite cigarette filters]

example.name: ARG1
example.text: But in her heart , her desire for love has never ceased .

roleset.note:
CEASE-V NOTES: I really didn't think this sentence was going to end this way. Cameas rather a surprise to me, to be honest. (from cease.01-v)
CESSATION-N NOTES: (from cessation.01-n)
